Manage employee expenses

Welipa provides a simple way to manage expenses by providing company credit cards to employees. All cards issued are unique to the employees. With Welipa, companies control the limits, purchases and lifetime of issued credit cards.

A more reliable way to understanding employee expenditure

Issue cards

Instantly issue physical or virtual Visa Commercial Debit cards to your employees with 1-click. Assign recurring monthly budgets or on-demand cards that work with request and approval of funds through the Payhawk mobile app. Manage spend limits, ATM withdrawals, and have instant control on your company cards.

Capture receipts

Our mobile application captures receipts for all purchases made on a Welipa card, making it easier to monitor expenditure.

Expenditure reports

Generate charts and graphs that help you visualize what employees are purchasing.
